full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 125 of 236 LC3KMAX4 Parkinson - Direct 1 Q. What do we see here? 2 A. This is a work area for notes and, apparently, cookbooks, and you are standing somewhat to the north, looking to the south. 5 MS. COMEY: Ms. Drescher, could you please zoom in on the center right part of this photograph. 7 Q. Would you please read aloud the words we see here, Mr. Parkinson? 9 A. "Jeffrey E. Epstein." 10 MS. COMEY: We can take that down. Thank you. 11 Q. I'd like to now show you what's been marked for identification as Government Exhibits 223 through 241. 13 THE COURT: Actually, Ms. Comey, we do have the lunch now, so we can break. 15 MS. COMEY: That would be much appreciated, your Honor. 17 THE COURT: Okay. 18 Members of the jury, enjoy your lunch. We'll see you in about 45 minutes to an hour. Thank you. 20 (Continued on next page) 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018226
